A mindset.

A target

Excited about learning the secrets of Japanese manufacturing.

There was none.

Meet the target, relentless pursuit.

Meet or exceed target.

What is the target.

Meet or exceed the need set by universal rather than meet or exceed man made expectations

Not what others think my needs are.

Not what we desire but what the heaven/nature have us do.

Not my will but thy will
